Text: does not work i always get the prison architect.exe has stopped working error. what do i do
Game works perfectly fine for me, though I need to run it as admin.
yea i tried that an still didnt work

Try searching on the official forum like here :
http://forums.introversion.co.uk/prisonarchitect/viewtopic.php?t=1153&start=0
Search "prison architect.exe has stopped working error" on google and try to see what they say on the official forum, some people say you got to delete some files
It worked for me on win7 x64

If it's crashing for you, try going to the preferences.txt file (one way to get there is to go to %appdata%, go up one folder so you're truly in the "appdata" folder, go to "local", then introversion, then "prison architect")

Change the values by ScreenW to something (width) and ScreenH to something (height) for example 800(w) x 600(h), and change ScreenWindowed to true.

This worked for me, and it might work for you, too.

try your method and I worked keeps sending the error. :/
